flavor: Dragon shards have had a grip on your heart since you were a child, and you’ve scoured the Shadow Marches in search of Eberron’s most valuable commodity. Have you ever struck it rich, only to lose your fortune through fraud, bad luck, or dissolute living? Would you like to repay any rivals for jumping one of your claims? What monsters and natural hazards of the Shadow Marches have you had to deal with?
name: Tharashk Prospector
